attributes.action: Reverse the decision to ban Geert Wilders from entering the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Recently a decision was made that, in the interests of 'community harmony' Geert Wilders would not be allowed into the UK.

Geert Wilders is an official Dutch politician.

His only crime in this PC-world was to make a film which was stitched-together from various *factual* sources of Islamic violence. Most of his film is news footage that has been seen before anyway.

Instead of everyone pointing the finger at Geert Wilders, why don't they expend their energy solving the root cause of Islamic worldwide violence?

Geert Wilders should be allowed into the UK, and should be issued with an apology.  The UK is very quickly making *factual* free speech a crime.

rejection.details: Individual legal cases are a matter for direct communication with the Home Office.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
